mapper.update: update wr_board set wr_title = #{wr_title}, wr_contents = #{wr_contents} where wr_no = #{wr_no}
mapper.delete: update wr_board set wr_del = 1 where wr_no = #{wr_no}
mapper.select: select wr_no, wr_title, wr_contents, name, wr_datetime, wr_hit, email, wr_del from wr_board where wr_no = #{wr_no}
select wr_no, wr_title, wr_contents, name, wr_datetime, wr_hit from wr_board where wr_del = 0
select wr_no, wr_title, wr_contents, name, wr_datetime, wr_hit from wr_board where wr_del = 0 order by wr_no desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
